nodes.text: Martz was a captain in the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars. They commanded the Acclamator-class assault ship Prosecutor, which was commandeered by Trandoshan mercenaries roughly one year into the war. They were presumed dead, most likely killed by the Trandoshan forces.
Martz is translated as "Stinnet" in the French and German version of Star Wars: Republic Commando.
